name: Seaside Cottage
description: A charming seaside cottage with beautiful ocean views, a private balcony, and all the comforts of home.

name: Downtown Loft
description: Modern and stylish loft in the heart of downtown, close to cafes, shops, and public transit. Perfect for urban explorers.

name: Mountain Cabin
description: A cozy cabin tucked in the mountains, complete with a fireplace, outdoor grill, and access to beautiful trails.

name: Tropical Villa
description: A luxurious villa surrounded by tropical gardens, featuring a private pool and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Lake House Retreat
description: This lakefront rental offers direct access to the lake, kayaks for guests, and an outdoor fire pit for cozy evenings.

name: Countryside Cottage
description: A peaceful countryside cottage with garden views and cozy amenities, ideal for a relaxing getaway in nature.
